newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Lisbon bourse studies extending share pre-opening.
newsitem.headline: Lisbon bourse studies extending share pre-opening.

text.p: The Lisbon bourse is considering restoring the pre-opening share period to one hour from the 30 minutes to which it was reduced recently, bourse sources said.
The pre-opening session currently runs from 0800 to 0830 GMT.
The sources said that the bourse was considering extending the period again because the system was having problems in absorbing so many orders in such a short time.
